author: Rob proffitt
comment: If you never tried it on Android wear, then what the hell is it for? You say it is for watches but that makes no sense. I wonder if the devs who made this is more confused than I am... Fail
title: Wtf

author: Andy Jenkinson
comment: There are watches out there which run full Android, include a phone and don't require tethering. This app is for them as the developer has said. If you have an inferior watch then this is not for you so please don't show your ignorance by rating it.
title: For smartphone watches NOT Android wear

comment: This is useless. There's no way to get it to work on Android Wear.
title: Useless

author: Oliver Neal
comment: Seems like a good idea but how do you actually get it to work on android wear?

reply.author: MIXBERRY LABS  PTE. LTD
reply.content: In fact, we've never tested it on Android Wear

title: Good idea

author: Robert Hamilton
comment: takes me back to palm :) excellent!

author: Boris Noginskiy
comment: I have checked this app. The app is very simply and affordable. Some times for training and you can enjoy the ease of entry the symbols
title: Feedback the EWriting

author: Josh McGraw
comment: It doesn't work in any way on the Android Wear, so why even market it as such? It works as a phone keyboard, but it's not any faster to use especially since the gestures are strange.
title: Why show the Android Wear

author: Patrick Goughler
comment: Doesn't even do what it advertises?
title: Ridiculous
